Name: Jolt'ini
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with 3 coffee beans floated in a petal formation in the centre of the cocktail's foamy head.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Degrees in Washington DC, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Jolt'ini contains 187 calories
